name: Vaporwave
prompt: A VibeDeck controller in vaporwave aesthetic. Pink and purple gradient colors. Greek marble column textures mixed with 90s technology. Palm trees and sunset colors reflected in chrome surfaces. The LCD shows retro Japanese text. Glitchy, nostalgic, internet aesthetic. Chrome and holographic materials. Pink neon glow. Checkerboard floor reflection. Memphis design elements. Dreamy hazy pink/purple lighting.
why: Internet culture, nostalgic appeal, distinctive look
